Reviews.Title: “Good solid service. No complaints.”

Reviews.Content: stayed 1 week feb 2012 courtyard marriotts didnt disappoint property isnt kept neat clean cleanups daily wifi courtyard marriotts wifi breakfast time chatting bartender day staff courteous helpful reason whatsoever complain decent parking space location dean martin drive lot marriott properties close mandalay bay 15 miles welcome las vegas sign fairly connected cabs beck call walk vegas fairly cabs expensive recommend longish 13 weeks business stays

Reviews.Title: “Nice property but no airport pickup”

Reviews.Content: nice uptodate courtyard thumbs shuttle service airport including tip cab ride airport 20 ridiculous distance probably 23 miles youre business traveler roundtrip shuttle service youll look elsewhere time stayed doubletree provided roundtrip service checked inquired front desk shuttle drop rental car facility morning told shuttle airport catch rental car shuttle checked morning hotel shuttle driver guy happy rental car terminal told front desk clerk didnt provided service stay car lack airport shuttle dealbreaker

Reviews.Title: “Great base in Vegas at a great price”
Reviews.Author: TheEasyGoingGuy
Reviews.Content: dont strip hotel easy access strip frank sinatra drive bellagio 10 minutes excellent staff friendly helpful appointed serene decor comfortable beds nice pool hot tub despite location near airport quiet light sleepers breakfast fair price dinner menu variety satisfying tasty ive stayed penthouse bellagio mgm grand return time im vegas hubub strip 12 mile walks casinos 4 minute elevator rides thank courtyard marriott las vegas south excellent retreat
